segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to reach that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand inside the jar and the other holding a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he's trying to catch cookies as he takes them out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool he's standing on looks so unstable, it's making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the stool's legs are splayed out, and it's tilted backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him is just waiting patiently for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem to realize how dangerous this situation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely oblivious to what's going on behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should say something, but I don't want to startle the boy and make him fall.
segments.speaker: PAR
